page.title: 02St. Nicholas Church Newport
page.content: {St. Nicholas Church}was built in the reign of Henry I.It was dedicated to St. Nicholas{patron St. of {fishermen.}The church was built in the year 1100. The tower is made of sandstone. It has 99 steps. On top is an illuminated cross and a flag pole. The{font}has been{moved}this year from the west end to the north end. The font is made of Sandstone. Inside the tower are some bells. Every quarter of an hour the bells ring automaticley. Some of the{pews}are being{exchanged {for chairs.}This is to allow them to be moved giving space at the front for concerts. They have also moved some pews on the north side for the{Sunday {school.}A church member said that the value of the church was to point the commumnity to the existence of God and reminds them of the Eternal Truth.
